PokerWheel Play with AI Welcome to poker wheel game, please read the following instructions: 1) A timer will show how much time you have left to play Notifications Game Notice Upper Left Card Upper Right Card Lower Left Card Lower Right Card End Turn
======= Instructions Back 1) A timer will show how much time you have left to play

2) You can swipe left or right to turn the wheel

3) There are 5 rounds in total and you can swipe left/right max 3 times in each round 2) You can swipe left or right to turn the wheel 3) There are 5 rounds in total and you can swipe left/right max 3 times in each round >>>>>>> main
